) } const mapState = state => ({ commentList: state.getIn(['discovery', 'commentList']) }) const mapDispatch = dispatch => ({ handleMoreClick () { dispatch(actionCreators.showDownload()) } }) export default connect( mapState, mapDispatch )(Comments)
